name: UNSC Hull Construction
desc: To make up for their poor shield generators, UNSC engineers designed an innovative honeycomb-structure armor configuration, with an especially insulative Titanium-A alloy that increases EMP resistance and module health by 50%%.
short: Improves EMP resistance and Weapons/Engines health.

name: UNSC AI Integration
desc: UNSC commanders are allocated an assortment of "dumb" tactical AI (grudgingly deemed low-level enough by the Hegemony) to integrate with their vessel's targeting systems and assist with fire-control calculations, increasing autofire accuracy by 25%%.
